name: Orbital Hyperbola
description:
An arcade-style game inspired by Space Invaders and Billiards/Pool. Move your spaceship sideways, "sink" the enemy orbs by knocking them into black holes, and destroy the aliens.

Controls:

  • A+D or Left+Right - move sideways
  • Left mouse click - shoot normal orb
  • Right mouse click - shoot gravity orb
  • Esc - pause

Credits:

  • svntax - programming, art
  • PVNDY - sound, music

Resources:

  • m5x7 font by Daniel Linssen
